thumb.title: Under the Maple Tree - Character theme vol.1 (XFD/Album Preview)
thumb.description: I present the PV of my first entry in this series. Under the Maple Tree - Character theme vol.1! I've been planning to show this project to the public for a few years now. I think releasing the characters' theme song album would be the most doable one for now. I have more plans in store for it, but I'll have to keep working for it.2025年8月2日に主要なストリーミングプラットフォームで配信開始されます。また、Gumroadでは$5、BOOTHでは¥750で販売されます。┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈Composer: @wingoflittleowlIllustrator: K┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈Tracklist:01 - Autumn Wind02 - When the leaves fall03 - Autumn Wind (Piano Solo)04 - When the leaves fall (Piano Solo 05 - Onee-san no Oto┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈https://linktr.ee/wingoflittleowl見てくれてありがとうございます
